DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess safety, PK/PD and Urate Lowering Effect of URC102 in gout patients with hyperuricemia
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of URC102 to Assess the Efficacy and Safety in Gout Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with gout Participated in other clinical study within 12 weeks prior to enrollment, and received an investigational product (including placebo)
